lines.gurmukhi: rcn cirqR icqR ibsm bicqrpn icqiH icqY icqY icqyrw aur AwnIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Rachan Charitr Chitr Bisam Bachitarapana , Chitrahi Chitai Chitai Chitayraa Ur Aaneeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: The process and event of creation is full of wonder, marvel, colourful and picturesque. Watching and appreciating the beautiful and picturesque creation, one should lodge the Creator in the heart.

lines.gurmukhi: bcn ibbyk tyk eyk hI Anyk myk suin Duin jMqR jMqRDwrI aunmwnIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Bachan Bibayk Tayk Ayk Hee Anayk Mayka , Souni Dhouni Jantr Jantradhaaree Ounamaaneeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: By the support of the words of Guru, and practicing of these words, one should see the presence of the Almighty in everything; just as listening to the tune of a musical instrument one feels the presence of the player in that melody.

lines.gurmukhi: Asn bsn Dn srb inDwn dwn krunw inDwn suKdweI pihcwnIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Asan Basan Dhan Sarab Nidhaan Daana , Karounaa Nidhaan Soukhadaaee Pahichaaneeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: One should recognise the provider of peace and comfort, the treasure-house of kindness from the food, bedding, wealth and donation of all other treasures that He has blessed us with.

lines.gurmukhi: kQqw bkqw sRoqw dwqw Bugqw sRbig pUrn bHm gur swDsMig jwnIAY ]244]
lines.transliteration_english: Kadataa Bakataa Srotaa Daataa Bhougataa Srabagi , Pooran Braham Gur Saadhasangi Jaaneeai ?244?

Shabad OS B.translation: The utterer of all words, demonstrator of everything, the listener, the donor of all things and relisher of all pleasures. the Omnipotent complete Lord like True Guru is known in the holy congregation of saintly people only. (244)
